## ThirdwebProviderProps.authUrl property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The base URL of the backend endpoints for wallet authentication. These endpoints should include /login and /logout route.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
authUrl?: string;
```
